metadata.synopsis: Asharak is next to the campfire, enjoying the festivities.

0.speaker: Asharak
0.text: It's nice out here - your own little patch of paradise.
0.context: NodeContext: Taking in the scenery of our campsite, thoughtful and a little tipsy

2.speaker: Asharak
2.text: Mind the g-word - every time you say 'goblin', you have to take a drink.

1.speaker: Asharak
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Asharak takes a drink after the lineNodeContext: He's just messed up his own drinking game and has to take a drink - does so after line.
